channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Dozens of Buildings Rendered Unstable by Hualien Earthquake
item.description: Dozens of buildings across Taiwan face demolition or extensive renovation work after last week's earthquake. What will happen to residents in the long term is unclear.

item.title: Hopes Fading for Six People Still Missing After Hualien Earthquake
item.description: Taiwan earthquake latest: Efforts continue to locate six people who remain missing in the mountains around Hualien. Meanwhile, the economic fallout of the quake is being tallied.

item.title: Legislators Propose Flexible Parental Leave Policies
item.description: Legislators in Taiwan are proposing changes to rules on parental leave to help working parents balance child care with their careers.

item.title: Ma Affirms Taiwan-China Ties Ahead of Expected Meeting With Xi
item.description: Former Taiwan President Ma Ying-jeou has reaffirmed his commitment to bringing Taiwan and China closer together ahead of an anticipated meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping.
